application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of details pursuant to Conditions 2.4 of Planning Permission F/04687/13 dated 23 July 2014 for the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area to make consequential amendments to the approved Revised Development Specification Framework, namely to; Table 1 Development Floorspace of the Revised Development Specification Framework); Zonal Floorspace Schedule (Appendix 5 of the Revised Development Specification Framework);Table 6 Floorspace Thresholds for Building Zones (included within Parameter Plan 014 of the Revised Development Specification Framework) affecting Business floorspace (Class B1) and Community Facilities floorspace (Class D1)
